caption.title: Maximum-Likelihood tree of ZIKV complete genome sequences.
caption.p: The tree was obtained using the best fitting nucleotide substitution model (TN93+G) selected by a hierarchical likelihood ratio test. Branches are drawn to scale in nucleotide substitutions per site according to the bar at the bottom of the tree. Percentage bootstrap (out of 1000 replicates) support values are given along branches. The Haiti sequence is in bold.
